long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EquityVal is an online financial modeling platform. EquityVal gives you the ability to create fully customizable financial models for publicly traded companies. Quickly view important financial metrics and data on a wide variety of public companies. 

The platform itself can be found at https://www.useequityval.com/ and can be used with or without the chrome extension.

This extension creates a convenient way to launch the app from your favorite stock viewing websites.

Currently supported platforms include:

Yahoo Finance
Google Finance
Robinhood
MarketWatch
StockTwits
Finviz
